price: 40. Maka Kami siksa dia (Fir'aun) dan bala tentaranya, lalu Kami lemparkan mereka ke dalam laut. Maka perhatikanlah bagaimana kesudahan orang yang zalim.
arabic: فَأَخَذۡنَٰهُ وَجُنُودَهُۥ فَنَبَذۡنَٰهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡيَمِّۖ فَٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-akhadhnāhu wajunūdahu fanabadhnāhum fī al-yami fa-unẓur kayfa kāna ʿāqibatu al-ẓālimīna
